717030110. Berg converted to reformed

Province of Berg — Not random

Triggered by

Action D of 717030111 - AI_EVENT for Muslim Nations
Action B, C, D of 717030112 - AI_EVENT for Muslim Nations

Description

As a result of the spread of the reformation, the province is now considered as being of the reformed faith.

Actions

A. OK

  • Religion in Berg changes to reformed
